sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
indicative of the existence or nature of something
, kaže na obstoj ali naravo nečesa.

seg.quote: He regarded their action as indicative of their lack of courage.

sense.def:
Kadar je neki glagol
in the indicative
, je v obliki, ki jo uporabljamo za trditve, v nasprotju z velelnimi ali vprašalnimi oblikami.
